item.title: About Me
item.description: As a Data Science and Analytics leader, I believe in the impact of decisions driven by rigorous strategic analytics. I have demonstrated experience in strategy development using appropriate analytical methods for Fortune 500 companies. To accomplish that, I lean on careful problem framing, develop critical questions, answer those using the best measurements and communicate precisely using a suitable instrument. In all the above, I lead by example, partner with cross-functional teams, leverage critical talent across the organization to advance goals while evolving internal capabilities.
